RelatedSentence: The Arab Youth Survey polled 3,500 Arab national men and women aged 18-24 in the six GCC countries , Iraq , Egypt , Jordan , Lebanon , Libya , Tunisia , Morocco , Algeria , Yemen and Palestine .
